 test24

Layer             : II  
Protection        : yes
Bitrate base      :  96 kbit/s
Sampling rate     : 16 kHz
Private bit       : 0
Mode              : rotating per frame: joint stereo 4, 8, 12, 16, stereo,... 
Copyright         : no
Original          : yes
Emphasis          : none (flat)

Configuration     : 2/0.0
Extension         : not applicable
Bitrate extension : not applicable
Matrix procedure  : not applicable
Matrix attenuation: not applicable
Phantom centre    : not applicable
Prediction        : not applicable
Multilingual      : not applicable

Ancillary data    : none

Nr. of frames     : 27
Test signal       : linear sine sweep, -6 dB, 20 Hz..7000 Hz
